paragraphs.content: Nothing in this Agreement shall obligate the Disclosing Party to disclose any particular Confidential Information.

All Confidential Information shall remain the sole and exclusive property of the Disclosing Party. Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed as granting any Receiving Party any right, title, ownership, interest, license, or other rights in or to the Confidential Information, including any intellectual property rights of the Disclosing Party, whether by license, implication, or otherwise.
Each Receiving Party shall have no rights to use or exploit the Confidential Information except as expressly permitted under this Agreement and solely for the Permitted Purpose.
